settings.name: WMS Datasource
settings.code:
data.full_power = 100
data.power = data.power * 100
data.power_used = data.full_power - data.power

typeInfo.name: Random
typeInfo.author: Lobaro
typeInfo.description: A datasource that provides a random value each tick

settings.name: Data
settings.description: The data that is returned by the datasource, must be an json-array of json-objects

typeInfo.name: Digimondo Firefly
typeInfo.author: Lobaro
typeInfo.description: Fetch parsed data from the Digimondo API

settings.name: Filter Device EUI
settings.description: Only parse data from given Device EUI

settings.name: Limit
settings.description: The amount Packets to be returned. Ordered by creation date, descending (unless otherwise specified through the direction parameter). Default value is 1 Maximum value is 100.

settings.name: Offset
settings.description: The amount of most recent Packets to skip before returning Packets. Default value is 0.

settings.name: Direction
settings.description: When set to asc, it will return the oldest Packets first. When set to desc, it will return the most recent packets. Default is desc.

settings.name: Fetch Interval
settings.description: How ofter should data be fetched in ms

typeInfo.name: WMS Datasource
typeInfo.author: Farrell Rafi
typeInfo.description: Fetch parsed data from a REST API

settings.name: Fetch Interval
settings.description: How ofter should data be fetched in ms

settings.name: Data Keys
settings.description: An array of Keys of an data object that define the data sets

settings.name: X Key
settings.description: Key of an data object that defines the X value

settings.name: Data Names
settings.description: Json object that maps Data Keys to displayed names

settings.name: Gauge Data
settings.description: Json object that is passed as configuration for gauge chats

typeInfo.name: Text
typeInfo.author: Lobaro
typeInfo.description: Display content of a datasource as plain text
